ValidationRule.description: This validation rule ensures that if the Contact Type field is set to "Agency Client," the Sharing Rule must be set to "Development Project Team, Private."
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( ContactType__c , "Agency Client") , NOT(ISPICKVAL( Sharing_Rule__c , "Development Projects Team,Private")) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If the Contact Type is 'Agency Client,' Sharing Rule must be 'Development Project Team, Private'.
